author: Bradley Hasemeyer
title: Richard Gere Posed as a Homeless Man
text:
Richard Gere Posed as a Homeless Man 3 Facts About the Actor 5:21 PM, Oct 13, 2015 Previous Next Richard Gere posed as a homeless man and gave away $100 to every homeless person. The List's Bradley Hasemeyer shares 3 facts about him, on The List! LSTV Previous Next 
Richard Gere posed as a homeless man and gave away $100 to every homeless person. The List's Bradley Hasemeyer shares 3 facts about him, on The List! 
3. He went to the University of Massachusetts on a gymnastic scholarship. 
2. In '93 he was banned from the Oscars for anti-China comments. 
1. And Number One... His middle name is Tiffany- just like his mother's. Copyright 2015 Scripps Media, Inc. All rights reserved. This material may not be published, broadcast, rewritten, or redistributed.
